description: The Minotaur migrate en masse toward the borders of Goliath Empire.
Natural disasters ravage Half-Orc Empire, decimating the Orc population.
Explorers from Goliath Empire uncover ancient relics of the Bugbear.
The Hobgoblin invent a new tool that revolutionizes life in Changeling Empire.
The Orc migrate en masse toward the borders of Centaur Empire.
A bloody war erupts between the Human and Genasi Empire.
The Dwarf invent a new tool that revolutionizes life in Dwarf Empire.
A bloody war erupts between the Goliath and Genasi Empire.
A rebellion led by Kalashtar dissidents shakes Warforged Empire.
Explorers from Shifter Empire uncover ancient relics of the Dwarf.
A bloody war erupts between the Half-Orc and Centaur Empire.
A rebellion led by Changeling dissidents shakes Tiefling Empire.
The Gnome migrate en masse toward the borders of Genasi Empire.
Explorers from Tiefling Empire uncover ancient relics of the Centaur.
A bloody war erupts between the Centaur and Hobgoblin Empire.
